repack.config.title: Re: Pack Configuration
repack.config.death.enableSounds.tooltip: If enabled, custom sounds will play upon death.
repack.config.death.specialChance.toolti: The chance for a special death event (1 in X deaths). Higher number means less frequent.
repack.config.death.screenEffect.tooltip: Choose the visual effect for special death.
repack.config.guide.enableBrewingGuide.t: If enabled, this part of the guide image will be shown in the brewing stand GUI.
repack.config.guide.brewingGuideStyle.to: Enter the file name (without .png) for this guide part (e.g., 'default', 'simple').
repack.config.guide.brewingGuidePosition: Choose where this guide part will be displayed relative to the GUI.
Adjust the horizontal position of this guide part.
Adjust the vertical position of this guide part.
repack.config.guide.brewingGuideWidth.to: Set the width of this guide part image in pixels. MUST match your PNG file!
repack.config.guide.brewingGuideHeight.t: Set the height of this guide part image in pixels. MUST match your PNG file!
